text: "I Thank You" is a 1968 song by Sam & Dave and was written by Isaac Hayes. It went to number 9 in the United States and number 4 on the Billboard R&B; chart. It was covered by ZZ Top for their sixth studio album Deg√ºello and went to number 34 in the United States. It was also covered by Bonnie Raitt for her The Glow. title: I Thank You (song)
